main event: An unidentified flying object was visually observed in Cathedral City, California on December 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, solid, black object wobbling rapidly and making a sound., One witness observed a metallic silver round object hovering and then disappearing into a mountain range., Several individuals reported seeing 4 large, brightly lit UFOs moving swiftly from east to west., A pilot in an F-86 jet fighter visually contacted an unidentified light that accelerated rapidly and disappeared., Witnesses believed some sightings could be related to Sputnik's rocket.
witness description: Mrs. XXXXX, housewife, and Richard A. Dahl, Richard A. Hughes, and other unidentified individuals.
